segments.text: This apartment is great , but could I upgrade a few things ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to have a different color carpet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you agree to pay more money , you could upgrade the carpet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would it cost a lot more ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It could be as little as 2 dollars or as much as 10 dollars more per square yard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was also wondering if it would be possible to pick a different paint color .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bring me a paint sample to look at , and I will consider it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When can you finish with the new carpet and paint ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your new apartment can be recarpeted and repainted by next Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S2
